City Council
============

2023-2026 Members
-----------------

The Portland City Council has seven members - a Mayor and six Council Members.

**![Mayor Cathy Skurow photo](https://www.portlandtx.gov/ImageRepository/Document?documentId=5264)Mayor Cathy Skurow**  
**Elected: 2024** (Term expires 2026)  
**Previous Terms:**Four as Mayor  
Eight as a Council Member  
(Three of those as Mayor Pro Tem)  
[**Email**](mailto:cathy.skurow@portlandtx.gov)[: Cathy.Skurow@PortlandTX.gov](mailto:Cathy.Skurow@PortlandTX.gov)

Council Overview
----------------

Portland operates under the council / manager form of municipal government. With this structure, the City Council and Mayor are elected by the citizens, and the City Council and Mayor hire a professional administrator, known as the [city manager](https://www.portlandtx.gov/90/City-Managers-Office "city manager") (link), to execute council policy and manage the day-to-day operations of the city.

1. [City Council](https://www.portlandtx.gov/310/City-Council)
2. [Boards & Commissions](https://www.portlandtx.gov/309/Boards-Commissions)

   1. [Planning & Zoning Commission](https://www.portlandtx.gov/334/Planning-Zoning-Commission)
